content.detailedDescription: I really don't know what to make of this. huge translucent tentacles? spirals, pefect squares, circles, equalateral triangles and crosses. the lower layer moves around slowly, back and forth and all around, beneath the upper layer. i would say the lady in phoenix was desribing identical phenomenon. i believe "hovering around in midair" is a good description. add to that description: pulsing, undulating,   breathing. they are wonderful artists. enjoy! (remember: don't freak out over it in public like i used to. most people are totaly blind to this for some reason. they'll only think your a nutter) today was the first day i've noticed it over austin since the 4th. if you focus your eyes just right, you can get a feel for the breadth of these things. they cover the entire sky. here are some examples of things i saw today. ive been scouring the internet looking for images of what i saw today. check out the cross! i saw one just like it today. imagine those tentacles squirming around all day long. and no, i'm not on drugs, rx or otherwise.
content.shape: Boomerang,  Circle,  Cross,  Disc,  Sphere,  Square,  Rectagular,  Triangle,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Weird clouds over austin. some sort of lifeform or craft

content.detailedDescription: I worked for the faa from 1966-1981. when i first started with the agency i worked with a retired b-47 pilot by the name of harvey williams. we were working a midwatch shift and we had preplotted military missions on plexi-glass overlays on top of a map of denver center all night. we got done about 5:30 am and we were sitting around shooting the breeze. i was a lot younger than harv and out of the blue i asked harv if he had ever seen anything when he was flying. he paused for a moment and replied that he had. i told him "bullshit harv you never have". he answered dead serious that he had and he would bring evidence of what he seen on the next midwatch. he brought color slides of disc shaped objects port holes and all in color, no mistake what those objects were, very clear and detailed. i lost track of harv about 1967 or 1968. since he was to old to become an air traffic controller i believe he went to a flight service station. i regret not getting copies of his slides, they are priceless. maybe your network can locate him, he would be about 85 years of age if he is still alive.
content.summary: Slide of disc

content.detailedDescription:
well, to begin, two of my best friend's and i had been throwing, kicking and passing a football; on the football practice field next to the basketball and elementary school building. we had been there for about an hour. after playing around that long we needed a rest. the time was around 7:45 p.M., we were sitting in the middle of the field on the fifty yard line. we had been sitting there for about 5 minute's when we heard a very loud noise coming from the south. the sun had just went down, you know that dusk time, but you could still see the outline of the tree's just across the street. the keep getting louder and closer, it sounded like 3 or 4 frieght train's coming at us, but there were no train track's near our town. we looked at each other, and exclaimed to each other; i wonder what it is, and just about that time the noise stopped. then we saw the outline of an object coming right at us over the tree's across the street to the south; there was still no noise, and the craft stopped right above us (approximately 40' above us) and you could not feel any wind change or hear any sound at all from the craft. we were mesmerized looking up at the craft, saying nothing, not moving, and barely breathing, to not make any noise. the craft was just hovering over us, it was in the shape of a triangle but not pointed on the end's; the corner's were more rounded, with neon like round blue and yellow light's approximately 3' in diameter. at the center of the craft there was a larger set of neon light's. these light's were round like the light's on the corner's, but there were 4 round graduating down to the center; purple, green, blue, and yellow in the center. they were not blinking. the craft itself was approximately 150' in width, and 225' in length. the craft seemed to be a medium grey color, but that could have been from the time of day; however, we had plenty of time to see all of the underneath and we really believed the color was right. then, all of sudden the craft started moving off very slowly, and when it got just above the gym building it took off very very fast, but there was not a sound. we ran as fast as we could to one of my friend's house, it was about 1/2 a block from the practice field, and took us only about 6 or 7 second's to get there, because you can run much faster when your that scared. and when we entered his home the tv was on, just as we entered the house, a news flash came on channel (kswo) in wichita falls, tex.. they reported that "sheppard air force base" which is 6 mile's north of wichita fall's, had just reported that an unidentified flying object had just flown over the base at a very high rate of speed. the "sheppard air force base" is approximately 38 mile's north of archer city, texas. so, it took us 6 second's to get to the house, and with approximately a 5 second delay for (kswo) to pick up on the info from the air base; that mean's that the craft which was just above us, covered approximately 40 mile's in "1" second. which if my calculation's are correct, the craft would have had to be traveling approximately 2,400 mile's per second, or 144,000 mile's an hour. now, i'm no scientist, but wouldn't an object traveling at that rate of speed through our atmosphere make quite a noise that could be heard well ahead of the craft? plus, when it took off from visiting my friend's and me, there was not a sound of acceleration. we made a promise to each other not to tell anyone about our "ufo" experience. but, this is something you just can never forget, and since that day i have known for sure that there are "et's" out there watching and studying us. the only people that i have divulged this information to is my immediate family (until now), and you may think that i am just another person trying to get a little attention, but i'm sure that if you investigated this "close encounter" with the "sheppard air force base" radar record's back during that time period, and also the (kswo) tv station's record's; you will believe me. however, everything that i have stated in this letter to you; (is the truth and nothing but the truth so help me god). you know, i know a polygraph isn't a 100 percent tool for getting the to the truth, but i would even agree to be given "scopolamine or thiopental sodium", this is my prof to you  that all i've stated in this report to you is the truth.
 

                              may god bless us all
content.summary: This was a close encounter.

content.detailedDescription: Fast moving from distance toward i4 route to west from orlando; it was very dark night, no moon; blimp like but no banner/no lights, only ambient light around craft
content.summary: Round no  blinking lights no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Escorting sister-in-law and brother down front porch steps brother looked up and said "what the hell is that thing".  hovering about 20 ft. away over a large tree was a large object with multiple framed lights or framed windows with bright yellowish lights shining thru' them.  it reminded me of seeing a train's windows at night but of course the object's windows were much larger and in rows. the middle row of windows longer as object was wider in the middle.  as i recall cigar shape comes to mind altho' somewhere it's possible the back was flat.  it hovered over the tree, my brother went back in the house to get my husband, and by that time it had moved slowly  above another tree about 40 ft. away. it stayed there momentarily, long enough for my husband to get a glimpse of it, and then accelerated very fast, became one orange-red colored light, and disappeared into the stars a long, long way off in a swooping motion.
this happened sometime around 1956.  i am sorry i did not do a sketch of the thing and when i asked my brother for one he sent some ungodly drawing.  actually, he has refused to talk about it as i soon learned that was best when i mentioned to someone what i saw and was  asked if i saw the object outside of the moose lodge.  i called the police dept. to ask if anyone had reported seeing anything and the response was negative.  i still vaguely see the thing and am still in amazement and hope to find out(altho' may be reunning out of time as will be 76 next week) what
the object was or if anyone has seen an object like i saw.  all pictures or descriptions i have seen of ufo's do not remind me of what i saw.
i still wish to remain anonymous but wonder what in the world was that ovject with no sound and so much speed.  please let me know if you have heard of anything as i have described.
thank you very much.
content.summary: No sound, hovering, rows of framed lights or lighted windows

content.detailedDescription: I was in the uffculme river feeld walking my dog when i hurd my dog barking at a tree i egnord it and carryed on walking then she stopt and started to howl then ran to the other side off the field i came to her and put the lead on. i looked around ubuve the tree line and could'nt see eneything so i took another quick glimps before walking on and saw a large disc hovering over head it made no nois or sudon movements it just stade in one spot but when i first saw it i thought that it was a street light after it had gone it made a bright flash and a loud bang like thunder i did'nt feel much after but i did jump when it disapered i had lost sight of the object when it made the noise it had brightend up the sky in a bright white glow i had ran back to the house and told my mum and dad but they did'nt think ennything of it.
content.summary: A wide grey disc dull in couler.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside looking at the sky cause i enjoy watching the sky you never know what you might see plus im definetly a beliver in aliens alaways has intrested me even as a kid but anyways i know that some ufos have been known to have multiple lights not just one like triangle dots can be the whole ufo and before i thought it was just one light usually but im looking up in the sky start seeing this dot move before i thought it just some low star or my mind playing tricks on me but its moving straight up as its goin up goes by another dot and that dot moves a little to the left and down like to stay out the way but the one im watching keeps going up then eventually stops just like that then starts heading my way its up real high so it still just looked like a dot just going over top of me it looked like it skipped or hoped as it went over like a stone in water but not big skips then i jus watched it till i couldn see it anymore my girlfriend seen it to she dont know what is was but shes not as intrested in that type of stuff like me but i went inside for a second then came back out i looked for that other dot that moved and i looked up in the sky n i see it moving the same directon but a little more to the right then watched till i couldnt see anymore i was convinced that it was a ufo especially the first one i never seen anything move that way just straight up then stop and head my direction ill be ready and watching tonight.Thank you and please let me know if anyone else seen these dots.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Looked like a bright white dot that was still at first then it starts to rise as its rising it passes another same looking dot that dot moves when the one im looking at is rising up the one which is rising stops then starts heading my way

content.detailedDescription: While driving to a local softball game neat 9 pm cdt my friend and i saw what looked like a large and small meteor streaking across the sky, very high in the sky.  as we continued to drive and follow the object we noticed an array of triangle shaped lights off in the distance...Almost to where the meteor like object was heading.  as the meteor objects faded into the distance, toward the horizon, the triangle formation of lights scattered very quickly in random like directions.  as i turned onto a street heading toward the direction of the lights in the sky they were gone and the whole thing was over.  we later, after the softball game, were listening to a local chicago radio station, 96.3 fm, and heard people call into the station and tell the dj (on air) that they had seen the lights or ufo's as well.  this occurred between 8:45-9pm on friday july 11th, 2008 near the town of lansing, il.
content.summary: Meteorite like streaks leading towards formation of triangle lights

content.detailedDescription:
I 81 bumper to bumper 75 mph gyroscopically pulsing orb unnatural fluttering towards ground saw object for only 5 sec.  was terrified for hours
i could tell it was something unnatural
weird start/stop fluid but jerky landing
i started screaming, looking at other drivers no one else seemed to notice
will get back with exact date (my friend got married that day)
content.summary: Pulsing orb lilting kinda like a leaf

content.detailedDescription:
Something weird is going on here in phoenix. for the last four days or so the cloud formations that are hovering in midair while the normal clouds drift with the wind have appearance of cloaked ships.  you can plainly see e.T. artistic manipulation in the cloaked cloud image. i have seen identical formations of clouds and et caricatures along with saucer activity leaving the larger cloaked ships posted on youtube as texas skies cloud ships.  fiber optics perhaps?  god's strong delusion sent during the end times?  i am troubled.

ps: the disc changed appearance from nearly invisible to bright reflection of noon sun, to maroonish bluish.  very camouflaged yet once detected easy to follow, no great rates of speed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bizarre clouds in phoenix, disc flying/tumbling near cloud ship! et art in clouds

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend shannon were outside in my backyard in the few minutes before darkness. she pointed out that there was a large off-white light in the sky. the sky was partly cloudy and there were a few stars. no star could be this big. it was the size of a marble helled about a foot away from your eye. it keep moving (from were i was standing) millimeters left and right. we called out my dad to make sure we weren't crazy. he came out and saw it. we were all standing and like a minute after he got out there it flashed. a extremely small red flashing light was there for about 18 to 20 seconds and then diapered in a flash. we all looked as hard as we could and there was nothing in it's place. nothing we could think of could be out in the sky and just turn out. it scared the crap out of us.
content.summary: A large burst of light

content.detailedDescription:
I saw this driving home on state street. too low to be a plane or astronomical phenomenon. too high to be part of a boat. object was large. no movement, no sound. had a yellow color to it & a crescent shape (facing up). i lost it in the trees/houses. i was curious, yet not compelled to investigate. i had a strange feeling that i should just ignore it.
it was not the moon. the moon was exactly at half that night.
content.summary: Crescent shape over bellingham bay.

content.detailedDescription:
I awoke late night, early morning.  i had been hearing strange sounds outside like construction work being done and couldn't understand why it is so loud outside this late at night.  i also heard dripping water sounds near my bedroom window and couldn't determine where this was coming from.  i slept for awhile but awoke and started looking out my windows 3-4am.  i didn't see anything except a strange large light hoovering out of my east windows at a distance, over farmersville maybe.  smaller lights were coming and going and i got tired of watching, nothing was happening.  i wanted to take a picture but couldn't locate my camera and it is a hassle getting the batteries in it(digital) esp that time of night.  i really wished i had taken a picture as i have seen a lot of sightings over the years and want proof for non-believers.  next night same thing and i got bored watching the lights and wished them away.  not sure about the next night if they were there but still hearing the sounds, getting really annoyed with this as it was disturbing my sleep.  the next day i am hearing stories about the lights over stephenville and wondered if the two were somehow connected?

also, pentecost sunday last year a hooded figure was spotted in my window at 5:30 am and hoovered away when it discovered that i was watching it as i lay in bed totally awake.  (something woke me and i rolled over and as i lay there trying to focus and determine why i am totally awake at 5:30am i see this)  also, it did not turn as you would see shoulders turn and depart but hoovered off to the west like a ghost or something else.  this may be discounted as they discovered a hooded man had broke in on a woman in the weatherford area and fought her as she lay in bed and took off when she fought him off.  at the time i freaked out and wanted to call the police but my family said no, they didn't hear or see anything.
content.summary: Object hoovering, not a star, not a plane with lights coming & going all around

content.detailedDescription:
I had just taken the trash out at 10:00 p.M. on june 26,1994.I turned around to go in when i saw to airplanes back to back which was odd. the 1st airplane going west turned & went south, the second object turned & came up  in my direction.It glided very slowly & no noise the size of a football field. had windows across like an airplane. i could light on th inside very bright lights  it moved over the highway and was triangle in shape & had 3 huge lights underneath about 500 feet it was very low
. then it turned & headed west again. it took aout 30 minutes because it was 10:30 when i came in. i just stood their frozen not scared just in awe of the size.  then in august 1994 2 monyhs later i had my blinds off my windows was watching tv & felt the need to rise up & look out my window, their were 2 green glowing lights hovering for 15 minutes. this time i was scared because my dogs were sleeping & if someone had been outside they would have barked. i didn't go outside but i cut my tv off & watched a small green ball of light hover in a shed next to our patio. my husband was asleep & still doesn't believe.I didn't have any film in my camera but it didn't matter i couldn't leave for fear of missing something.
 maybe it was government but i can't explain the hovering lights in front of my window at 12:00 p.M
content.summary: Was going west & turned & came toward mgregor on 317 made no sound size of a football field had windows like an airlpane then turned after coming over me & went west towards

content.detailedDescription:
I had just taken the trash out at 10:00 p.M. on june 26,1994.I turned around to go in when i saw to airplanes back to back which was odd. the 1st airplane going west turned & went south, the second object turned & came up  in my direction.It glided very slowly & no noise the size of a football field. had windows across like an airplane. i could light on th inside very bright lights  it moved over the highway and was triangle in shape & had 3 huge lights underneath about 500 feet it was very low
. then it turned & headed west again. it took aout 30 minutes because it was 10:30 when i came in. i just stood their frozen not scared just in awe of the size.  then in august 1994 2 monyhs later i had my blinds off my windows was watching tv & felt the need to rise up & look out my window, their were 2 green glowing lights hovering for 15 minutes. this time i was scared because my dogs were sleeping & if someone had been outside they would have barked. i didn't go outside but i cut my tv off & watched a small green ball of light hover in a shed next to our patio. my husband was asleep & still doesn't believe.I didn't have any film in my camera but it didn't matter i couldn't leave for fear of missing something.
 maybe it was government but i can't explain the hovering lights in front of my window at 12:00 p.M
content.summary: Was going west & turned & came toward mgregor on 317 made no sound size of a football field had windows like an airlpane then turned after coming over me & went west towards

content.detailedDescription:
On october 27, 2007 i was outside on the back patio smoking a cigar at victors coctail lounge.  i was sober.  i was near the corner of convoy and armour streets in san diego, california.  i observed 4 large white lights fly almost directly over me.  i immediately went home and filed a report, within 2 hours, to the national ufo reporting agency.  it has been posted and i have copied and pasted the report below.  

after a few months, i think january 2008, i joined mufon.   i thought i should also post this sighting with mufon.  

also, i watched larry king live last night and they talked about the stephenville, texas sighting with multiple radar contacts.  my sighting last october should also have multiple radar hits since the craft, or crafts, passed over miramar and montgomery air fields.

in reading my old report below, i see where i could make it more clear.  the v-shaped lights were above the lowest level of clouds (rain clouds); but below the highest level of clouds (wispy clouds).  this is not very high.  the lights were 4 times larger than the largest star.  if these were military craft lights, there would have been a loud roar, there was no noice.  also, when i saw this formation of lights, i immediately knew it was unique and i did not think these were military or civilian crafts.


----------------------

occurred : 10/27/2007 19:48 (entered as : 10/27/07 19:48)
reported: 10/27/2007 9:53:35 pm 21:53
posted: 11/28/2007
location: san diego, ca
shape: light
duration:5 seconds
4 white lights in a v-shape flying above the clouds across the sky in about 5 seconds.

this evening, saturday, october 27, 2007 at 7:48 pacific time, i saw 4 lights, shaped in a tight v-shape (2 on each side), fly across the sky from north to south almost directly over me; but passing slightly east of my location. i was in a dark area near the corner of convoy and armour streets in san diego, california. this area is directly under the flight path of montgomery field and a few miles south of miramar marine air station. i have lived around the miramar marine air station for 20 years in several locations. i have seen just about every possible plane and plane formation flying over me in this area and i have never seen anything like this.

each light was about the 3 or 4 times the size of a normal star (so they were very obvious). a plane close enough to have a light that large would be very loud; but there was no sound. the distance between each light was about the same as each light (making it seem like all 4 lights were linked) but i could not see anything in-between the lights. this was a tight formation. this v-shape of lights traveled from north to south across two-thirds of the sky in about 5 seconds (5 seconds is not a quick glance---i watched it clearly).

tonight, at 7:48 pm, there was about 10 to 20 percent of wispy cloud cover and these lights were above the clouds; but i do not know how high above the clouds. i could see the lights through the clouds as they passed over the clouds.

the quality of the lights needs mentioning. the lights were solid and bright; but not a bright light like a star or blinking plane light. these lights were different, maybe softer. these lights did not blink. i guess the best description of these lights would be a slightly dim, off-white. i say they were a v-shape; but the open end would be wider than a typical v.
content.summary: V-formation of 4 large lights (without center of v) flying over miramar naval base and montgomery airfield below top cloud cover with no noice

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?

"in the back yard celebrating the 4th of july with the kids and their friends."

 2. what made you first notice the object?

"one of the kids yelled at us to look at the orb"

 3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

"an orb"

 4. describe the object and its actions and motions.

"an orage sphere flew low and seemed as though they were right over the tree tops. it looked like it was about 4 ot 5 feet in diameter but we are not really sure how low it actually was. i flew over us heading northwest at about 25 maybe 35 miles an hour, but once it passed over our house it turned and went either north or northeast.
it looked like there was a ring around the glowing mass kind of like it had a clear outer shell to it.
there were around 10 people with us that night (including my 12 year old) and all of them saw it and verified to me that this was absolutely no type of fireworks and it made no sound at all."

 5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

"amazed"

 6. how did you lose sight of the object?

"lost sight as it kept going"
content.summary: Orange sphere

content.detailedDescription: After my daughter says why is it acting at the 41 second point watch top center  please contact me and tell me what this was
content.summary: Changing direction black dot

content.detailedDescription:
The below is a copy of an e mail i sent to a friend on 01/09/2008 of this year while it was fresh on my mind. several days later the reports from stephensville texas started trickling out. sometime later we seen the video on larry king...It was the same thing we seen only our reports were buried by texas...Call me? "i was in the front yard feeding my dogs and it was early evening probably 7:15 pm and the stars had enough time to really start shining. the night was crystal clear and the stars were thick. as i scanned the universe and took the time to admire each cluster before moving on to the next  airplanes flying overhead and at a distance like a long train every couple of minutes (we live under a hartsfield international flight path) their lights gently blinking as they made their way, they paled in comparison to the pinpoint radiant lights of the stars. even took in and wished on two shooting stars. it was very serene, very peaceful. i was scanning east to west and as i hit the tree top horizon i noticed a glowing, light pulsating, large cloud. it was obviously in outer space, there was a plane flying in front of it and the plane looked so tiny in comparison. then it moved...Quickly. almost like it was falling towards the earth. the first thing i thought of was that comet you wrote of recently. but this thing moved and behaved like nothing i ever seen before, the lights were multicolored almost like flashers on the airplane just much brighter and methodical, and it was so big. too big to be a plane, to high to be a chopper. i called several friends and neighbors through out south central ga spanning a radius of 100 miles in every direction and requested they all go outside and look west, they all seen it and were as stumped as i as too what it was. imagine the excitement of a real live ufo? finally i looked up 13wmaz.Com in the yellow pages and called the first three of 4 phone# s and nobody answered until i tried the last number, i simply said "go outside and look west" they replied they were looking at it and had the entire evening staff out there trying to figure out what it was. initially they were confident it was "the comet" but would check with ben jones station meteorologist and let us know the official conclusion. we had all kind of comet theories the next day and questions to go along, still do. the next evening ben jones while doing the 6:00 o'clock weather responded to the flood of inquiries the night before and stated he spoke with somebody who told him what we all seen was a rocket dumping fuel.
why does a rocket have enough fuel to dump after he gets into space and would it not make more sense to only take enough fuel to get into space? that is only one of many questions. the tv station has made no more mention in any other newscast or on line forum about the ufo. i do believe it was some kind of man made craft, just have not ever seen anything that large, visible and behave like that...Anyway just wanted to share that with you, i felt it ironic considering we were discussing ufos."
content.summary: Same thing shown on lkl video from stephensville texas

content.detailedDescription:
Around 9:00 p.M., est, i was stargazing from my deck and noticed a couple of very brilliantly twinkling "stars" and as i watched, they began to move first slightly and then almost playfully, back and forth and in circles.  i called to my neighbor who was on her deck and she walked over and also sighted the objects speculating it might be a satellite.  i told her i didn't think so, not two separate objects literally dancing around in the atmosphere.  she left and i continued to watch and within minutes there was suddenly at least six objects moving about in no particular pattern, like children playing circle tag!  i knew it couldn't be aircraft flying in such a frivolous manner, it was far too high for helicopters which also could not make such maneuvers so there was therefore only one explanation--et's.  i had no particular "feelings" while watching--i wouldn't expect anything that playful would be likely to be dangerous.  i wondered while i watched if they were seeing me far more clearly and just putting on a litle show for me!  i didn't lose sight but simply went inside and left them to their play time.
this is not the first "sighting" in my area by far.  my son says he saw four objects high in the sky at a nearby lake a week ago.  a group of us in my old neighborhood watched one for a long time, again high in the sky, back in the 70's and i have heard of many other unexplained ufo's in this area.
i read an aricle a few years ago by gary stearman, prophecy in the news co-host that i found to be very interesting from a christian point of view.  you might want to reference it at www.Prophecyinthenews, i think it's .Org.  i imagine you also know the story of ezekiel in the bible who was taken up into the heavens in a fiery chariot described as a wheel within a wheel.
content.summary: Star-like, twinkling brilliantly, moving about erratically in seemingly a small area.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house smoking a cigarette, and i decided to move a lawn chair out into the yard so i could look at the sky. it was the perfect summer night. all i could hear were crickets, and the skies were clear. i was looking about 40 degrees up to the east, and that's when i saw it appear. it was such a shock to me that i can't tell if it rapidly decelerated to a speed at which it was visible (who knows?) or if it just "turned on its lights". i literally jumped in my seat! we've all seen meteors, they reach a point at which the friction and pressure of the atmosphere builds up heat which produces incandescent light that we see for usually no more than a fraction of a second. if this was a meteor, then i'm santa claus. it was already moving when it appeared (like a meteor), but its brightness didn't fade (the lights did pulsate, however), there was no rapid descent, and i was able to follow it to the horizon. fireballs have been visible over several states before they either impact the ground (or someone's unfortunate car), but this object wasn't as bright as jupiter, it left no trail, and nothing was seen breaking off of it. i could be one of the lucky few who have witnessed an earth-grazing fireball, but i doubt it. here's why: the object had red and white lights, but not lights as you'd expect to see on an aircraft. they weren't points of light; rather there was a center that was brighter than the periphery around it. that's the best i can explain it. the center part wasn't even that bright, but the smooth glow of the light around it really set it apart from anything i'd ever seen. this object definitely had some size to it. let's assume this was something entering the atmosphere. from my point of view, the apparent size of the object was no smaller than a commercial airliner at cruising altitude, possibly larger. i'm no expert on which altitudes objects start to glow at as they enter the atmosphere, but it has to be more than 40,000 feet, making this thing at least as big as an aircraft. there are lots of variables involved, but that seems logical to me. this thing had to have been seen on radar. it was going northward, possibly nnw. there was no sound whatsoever. if this was an aircraft, it would have to at least be going mach 1 at roughly 10,000 feet. that's as slow and as low as this thing could have been going. the higher up this thing actually was, the faster it was actually going. i should have been able to hear something if this was an aircraft. b-2's and f-117's are pretty quiet, but they're also subsonic. i don't know of any pilot who'd put his butt on his line just to fly at supersonic speeds over the continental us. that's a pretty big no-no. please call or email me if you have any questions, or if i'm flat-out wrong about something. thanks for looking into it for me.
content.summary: Ufo with glowing red and white lights appears at one point in sky and streaks to horizon

content.detailedDescription:
While at my job as security office a light approached from th south sky at a very high rate of speed the in the north sky the light went out and it vanished from sight because of the night sky...The horizontal flight path and the speed eliminates the possibility of a meteor or shooting star
and the object made no sound
content.summary: Bright and fast lighted object

content.detailedDescription:
I'm typing this as i search for what an iridium flare can unexpectedly look like...Here's what i saw:  according to heavensabove.Com, at 10:36:16, on 7/11,  there was a predicted iridium flare located at 11 degrees altitude, on the azimuth at 250 degrees wsw, at a -2 intensity/magnitude, due to occur about 86 km e of mesa, az. 
  ok, just made sure that zero misidentified i.Flares are even similar to what i just saw.  interesting...Anyways-i was on the computer on my patio when i had a strange feeling i'd forgotten something, and i looked at the clock and realized it was 10:37, and remembered the flare prediction for 10:36.  so i jumped up and found my bearings direction-wise, and looked right around where i'd assume the wsw to be.  the altitude was rather low-only listed at 11 degrees, so i tried to look almost straight ahead (i'm on the 2nd floor of my building), with the moon nearly directly overhead of where i tried to focus.  there are street lamps in the distance, barely higher than the roofs of the buildings i was overlooking, and-almost as soon as i had began to focus on this spot (that i believed to be 250 deg wsw, low 11 deg alt) i noticed orangish looking "things" kinda circling the orange street light.  
  it really looked like the way large bugs do that you see circling clumsily around a large, parking lot-type light at nightime.  i had my binoculars and quickly looked at the street light and noticed not only 1, but 3 or 4 orange lit objects sharply circling this light (or so it appeared) at an amazing speed.  i mean like hows you see atoms(protons?) circling a nucleus in an animated example--kind of an eliptical pattern(right word?  an oval orbit moreso than a circular one), super sharp/quick at the turns yet more prolonged motion from end to end(of the turn)--it was incredible.  quickly gathering that this was no flare i yelled for my roommate to come out.  i put the binoculars down for a sec and glanced to see if he was coming, then looked up and saw them with my naked eye for a second, and put the binoculars back to my face.  these things were going around in all different directions, as in orbiting/circling from, say, top left of the light to bottom right and back-top right to bottom left-etc, yet they were all going the same unbelievable speed and the same motions.  i yelled back much louder for my roommate to come, and looked over again to see if he was comin, and when i looked back-they were gone.  unbelievable.
content.summary: Waiting for iridium flare as predicted by habove.Com...

content.detailedDescription: During the pensacola blues air show i was standing at the center of the crowd.  early in the show, about 35 minutes into the show, i was observing a bi-plane doing his maneuvers with much smoke.  suddenly, i noticed this circular object and initially thought it was  a smoke ring.  the smoke from the biplane dissipated and the object remained the same size and shape moving slowly in an easterly direction. in the photos it appears to be on a slant.  the last image i saw of it leveled off.  it disappeared behind cloud cover.  i showed my photo to several people and they claim to have seen it as well.  i am a former crew cheif , aircraft mechanic, on f-4's and i know what aircraft look like.  this was something i have never seen before.  what you see in the photo is what i saw with the naked eye.  i took the photo because thats what i saw with the naked eye.
content.summary: Circle appeared and disappeared in a matter of seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was climbing up mt harvard in 2006 once i passed the tree line i turned around and took this photo of mt. yale. and did not notice anything out of the ordinary, it wasnt until i got home and downloaded my pictures and looked at them in there full size that i did noticed this object in the photo. i thought the object was an aircaft at first but i magnified the picture and cut (picure 2) and then noticed it was no identifiable aircraft.
content.summary: Sighting over mt. yale

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my kitchen cooking with 3 friends at 12:30 am on the 11th of july,2008, when i had an urge to step out on my porch. as soon as i stepped out and looked up i saw what i thought was a low flying airplane. as the craft came closer i noticed that it made no sounds at all. none. i realized also that the craft was flying way too low for faa regs. then i noticed that the craft was shaped in a triangle or arrowhead. it was flying very fast and very smooth motion, straight line. i ran inside and alerted the other 3 who ran outside just in time to see that it was a triangle craft, that it made no sound, that it was flying very fast and very low, and that it was flying away from our home towards ft. knox military base. i tried to get out my cell phone camera for pictures but i was way too slow.



large triangle craft, white lights on all 3 corners, 1 red light and 1 white light on each side if the craft. no noise. all 4 witnesses described the incident in the same manner, exactly.
content.summary: Large triangle craft, white lights on all 3 corners, 1 red light and 1 white light on each side if the craft. no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw something else.   they are getting closer.
it was a light blue disk...With a yellow window in the center of it.
lit up right before my eyes...Just south of me.
it lit up like a flourescent light...And shut off.
it was closer than anything i have seen so far.
it was only for one second at the very most...And i did get a picture.
content.summary: Blue disk spotted

content.detailedDescription:
i was working third shift at a machine shop in the jeffersonville industrial park.  i was outside having a cigarette watching the ups planes waiting in line to land at louisville international airport. 

   i noticed a very bright red light to the northwest, the intensity was comparable to aircraft landing lights.  the object was estimated as dime size at arm's length.  this object exhibited a strange non-ballistic motion which was apparently tied in with the intensity of the light, in that the light would pulse from bright to dim and as it did so the object would move and stop.  it would brighten and move forward, then it would dim and stop, then brighten and move backwards, then dim and stop.

  i watched this for what seemed like a few minutes when i noticed all the ups jets had been waved off and were moving away.  so i ran back inside the shop and got the nearest person's attention, if only to verify that this was as strange as i believed it to be.  upon arrival back outside i found the object had moved very little and was still to the northwest approximately 2-3 miles distant.  all the jets had left the area at this time and i noticed there was no noise associated with this object.  the first words out of the secondary witness were "holy s**t".

  we watched this thing move across the sky in a very erratic fashion and it seemed to drift in our direction.  it finally reached a point almost directly over the building and showed no structure other than the red light itself.  this thing was emitting no noise whatsoever!  after watching this for at least 5 minutes we heard the sound of jet engines approaching from the east.  suddenly a military fighter jet came into view heading directly at the red light.  three seconds before they merged the red light dropped an unlit secondary sphere which was only visible by the reflection from the main object's light.  the red light blinked off and was gone just as the jet passed it's location.  the secondary object could not be sighted.  the jet did a wing dip as if he was trying to re-aquire the target, he then made a right turn and departed the area heading east.  after a few minutes more the ups planes were back in line and the whole encounter was over.

   there should be radar tapes of this encounter somewhere, and at least a few of the ups pilots had to have seen this as well as the fighter pilot.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Deep ruby red colored orb with detachable secondary sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
Five ufos sighted, one cigar shaped and four flattened christmas ornament shaped, thicker than movie saucer shape anyway.  we live near moody and are both military brats, now middle age.  have seen a lot of planes and these were not planes.
noticed the cigar shaped one first and did not see others until i got out binoculars to look in that area, as they had some cloud cover.  with binoculars i could see the metal and steam-like haze around them.  excellent "camo"; we were impressed. one was huge.  could not believe it was real but metal could be seen with haze cover with binoculars.  without blended well with clouds.  had to have known to look.
if i had not been very used to seeing planes, i would never have noticed the cigar shaped object.  i attempted pictures also but they did not turn out well.  i do not expect anyone to believe us, as beach folk were walking and did not appear to notice that we could see.
most eyes were on several groups of porpoises swimming northward close to the beach, one group after another that went on for about an hour before, during, and after the sighting.
content.summary: Five ufos one cigar, four disk
